fields.label: Page Settings
fields.name: page_settings
fields.video_description: A Page Builder is custom feature developed by Flothemes that allows you to customize pages using various predesigned Blocks. These Blocks can be moved around, edited and deleted. You are also able to add these Blocks into our predesigned Page Templates.
fields.video_embed: <iframe width="800" height="500" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ygV40xfN4pg" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

fields.label: Templates Overview
fields.name: templates_overview
fields.video_description: A Page Template is a pre-designed page layout that can be used for creating different pages such as Homepage, About, Contact, etc. Each theme include a variety of different Page Templates to choose from. In many cases there is more than one Template available for a certain page, for example, a theme may include 3 Homepage Templates.
fields.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/n2z2aBMw_oQ" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

fields.label: Homepages
fields.name: homepages
fields.video_description: Homepages are definitely one of the most complex pages within a website. It is one of those pages where you want to spend most of your time and make sure every piece of content deserves to be there. A carefully crafted page, with attention to detail will make a user want to explore your website further.
fields.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/KYMeT6UYbqU" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

fields.label: Listing Page
fields.name: Listing_Page
fields.video_description:
The Listing Template is the easiest way to create a Blog or Gallery Listing Page. This Template allows you to showcase your latest Blog Post or Galleries.

You can find this template in the Pages â€“ Templates section.
fields.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/I8mjIpdgDNU" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

fields.label: Contact Page
fields.name: contact_page
fields.video_description: First of all, each theme has a few different layouts to offer. Sometimes these layouts can be very simple, and sometimes they can include additional Blocks. It is important to remember that none of the Page Templates we offer are hard coded, therefore you can easily add additional Content Blocks if necessary.
fields.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/P5QvKuD8RKg" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

fields.label: About Page
fields.name: about_page
fields.video_description: About Pages are unique for each theme. In most cases they are a combination of many different types of Image and Text Blocks. All Blocks used in our default templates are Standalone Blocks, therefore all page content is added within these blocks.
fields.video_embed: <iframe width="800" height="500" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/vCN_YwsXSmA" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

fields.label: Template Selector
fields.name: template_selector
fields.title: Choose a Layout Template
fields.subtitle: Note: all the blocks from the current layout will be replaced with the ones from the selected template.

fields.label: Info
fields.message: Here you can add, remove and sort the blocks of your page's layout.
